segments.text: Good afternoon , Peace Hotel , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have made a reservation for this Sunday . My name is Bobby
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's right . Your room is a single one with a bath .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am calling to cancel it now . I can't go to your city this week .
segments.speaker: S2
